actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the investment yield on the tax-exempt All Savers Certificates shall be increased from 70 to 85 percent of the average investment yield for United States Treasury bills of maturities of 52 weeks.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the investment yield requirement on tax-exempt all savers certificates from 70 to 85 percent of the average investment yield for Treasury bills with 52-week maturities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the investment yield on the tax-exempt All Savers Certificates shall be increased from 70 to 85 percent of the average investment yield for United States Treasury bills of maturities of 52 weeks.
